mapper.insert: insert into shop_cart(memberId, itemId, itemCount) values(#{memberId}, #{itemId}, #{itemCount})
mapper.update: update shop_cart set itemCount=#{itemCount} where cartId = #{cartId}
mapper.select: select * from shop_cart where memberId = #{memberId} and itemId = #{itemId}
mapper.delete: delete from shop_cart where memberId = #{memberId} and itemId = #{itemId}
